article_title: Political Diary: The Union That Stole Christmas
article_text:
Christmas may come late for many Americans this year thanks to a West Coast labor brawl.

Manufacturers and retailers complain that the International Longshore and Warehouse Union (ILWU), which represents about 20,000 dockworkers on West Coast ports, has deliberately slowed down traffic during the holiday season to increase their leverage in contract negotiations. Because the union’s last collective-bargaining agreement expired in...
